DdMd::DiagnosticManager Class Reference
Diagnostics

Detailed Description

Manager for a list of Diagnostic objects.

void DdMd::DiagnosticManager::setup ( )

Call setup method of each Diagnostic.

This method should be called just before the main simulation loop, after an initial configuration is known.
